content.webTitle: Chelsea v Crystal Palace: match preview

fields.headline: Chelsea v Crystal Palace: match preview
fields.bodyText: Stamford Bridge has not been a fortress for Chelsea this season. They have won three of their nine home games in all competitions and they will miss the suspended Jorginho against Crystal Palace, who have picked up impressive results at West Ham, Manchester United and Arsenal. Mason Mount is also a doubt with an ankle injury. Jacob Steinberg Saturday 12.30pm BT Sport 1 Venue Stamford Bridge Last season Chelsea 3 Crystal Palace 1 Referee Mike Dean This season G9 Y43 R2 5 cards/game Odds H 4-11 A 19-2 D 23-5 CHELSEA Subs from Caballero, Cumming, Christensen, Guehi, Alonso, James, Gilmour, Pedro, Hudson-Odoi, Batshuayi, Giroud Doubtful Mount (ankle) Injured Barkley (ankle, 23 Nov), Rüdiger (groin, 30 Nov), Loftus-Cheek (achilles, unknown) Suspended Jorginho (one match) Discipline Y20 R0 Form LWWWWW Leading scorer Abraham 9 CRYSTAL PALACE Subs from Guaita, Woods, Riedewald, Camarasa, Dann, McCarthy, Meyer, Benteke, Kelly, Dreher, Tavares, Lokilo, Townsend Doubtful Cahill (head), Kouyaté (head) Injured Sakho (match fitness, unknown) Suspended None Discipline Y22 R0 Form DWWLDL Leading scorer Ayew 4
